Aries.name: Aries
Aries.characteristics: Aries is the first sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with fresh vigor and new beginnings. Individuals born under this sign are said to have an enthusiastic, adventurous, and passionate character. They are usually ambitious, humorous, and pioneering. On the less positive side, they're also said to be prone to selfishness, boastfulness, intolerance, impulsiveness, and impatience.

Aries.name: BBE
Aries.description: Bad b**** energy. Be blessed, be spicy.

Aries.name: K-Hip-Hop +82
Aries.description: Representin' +82 Korean Hip-Hop's sickest rhymes and beats.

Taurus.name: Taurus
Taurus.characteristics: Taurus is the second sign of the Zodiac and is associated with material pleasure. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a calm, patient, reliable, loyal, affectionate, sensuous, ambitious, and determined character. They are also prone to hedonism, laziness, inflexibility, jealousy, and antipathy.

Taurus.name: Feeling Accomplished
Taurus.description: Celebrate yourself with a fun pop & hip hop mix.

Taurus.name: Monday Motivation
Taurus.description: Giving motivation to your Monday. You got this!

Taurus.name: Cozy Blend
Taurus.description: Enjoy a break with some relaxing soft songs.

Gemini.name: Gemini
Gemini.characteristics: Gemini is the third sign of the Zodiac and is associated with youth and versatility. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a sociable, fun-loving, versatile, lively, communicative, liberal, intelligent, mentally active, and friendly character. They are also thought to be prone to moodiness, inconsistency, superficiality, restlessness, and laziness.

Gemini.name: Feelin' Myself
Gemini.description: The hip-hop playlist that's a whole mood.

Gemini.name: Energy Booster: K-Pop
Gemini.description: Need to get your energy level up? This will help!

Cancer.name: Cancer
Cancer.characteristics: Cancer is the fourth sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with family and domesticity. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a kind, emotional, romantic, imaginative, sympathetic, nurturing, and intuitive character. They are also supposed to be prone to changeability, moodiness, hypersensitivity, depression, and clingy behavior.

Cancer.name: Piano Ballads
Cancer.description: Vocals and keys, front and center.

Leo.name: Leo
Leo.characteristics: Leo is the fifth sign of the Zodiac and is associated with the keywords magnanimous, generous, hospitable, caring, warm, authoritative, active, and open. Leos are typically pictured as very dignified and regal. They are hard-working, ambitious, and enthusiastic, however, they are supposedly prone to laziness, often choosing to take 'the easy way out.' They are known to be exuberant, extroverted, and generous. They have a natural dramatic flair and are very creative. They are typically very self-assured and love taking center-stage in whatever arena they are in.

Leo.name: Confidence Boost
Leo.description: You're on top of the world. Don't forget it.

Leo.name: BBE
Leo.description: Bad b**** energy. Be blessed, be spicy.

Leo.name: K-Hip-Hop +82
Leo.description: Representin' +82 Korean Hip-Hop's sickest rhymes and beats.

Virgo.name: Virgo
Virgo.characteristics: Virgo is the sixth sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with purity and service. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a diligent, analytical, self-sufficient, controlled, orderly, and modest character. But they are also prone to fussiness, perfectionism, harsh criticism, coldness, and hypochondria.

Virgo.name: Feeling Accomplished
Virgo.description: Celebrate yourself with a fun pop & hip hop mix.

Virgo.name: Motivation Mix
Virgo.description: Uplifting and energetic music that helps you stay motivated.

Libra.name: Libra
Libra.characteristics: Libra is the seventh sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with justice. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a pleasant, articulate, charming, social, charismatic character. They are artistic. But they also possess a fair, refined, diplomatic, even-tempered and self-sufficient character. On the negative side, they are thought to be indecisive, lazy, aloof, flirtatious, and shallow. They are also supposedly extravagant, frivolous, impatient, envious, and quarrelsome.

Libra.name: Feelin' Myself
Libra.description: The hip-hop playlist that's a whole mood.

Libra.name: Energy Booster: K-Pop
Libra.description: Need to get your energy level up? This will help!

Scorpio.name: Scorpio: Dua Saleh Takeover
Scorpio.description: Tracks for The Scorpion with guest curation by Dua Saleh.
Scorpio.characteristics: Scorpio is the eighth sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with intensity, passion, and power. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a complex, analytical, patient, keenly perceptive, inquisitive, focused, determined, hypnotic, and self-contained character. They are also prone to extremity, jealousy, envy, secretiveness, possessiveness, cruelty, and cunning.

Scorpio.name: Piano Ballads
Scorpio.description: Vocals and keys, front and center.

Scorpio.name: Are & Be
Scorpio.description: The pulse of R&B music today.

Sagittarius.name: Sagittarius
Sagittarius.characteristics: Sagittarius is the ninth sign of the Zodiac. It is associated with travel and expansion. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a straight-forward, dynamic, highly intelligent, extremely clever, ethical, humorous, generous, open-hearted, compassionate, and energetic character. They are also prone to restlessness, impulsiveness, impatience, and recklessness.

Sagittarius.name: K-Hip-Hop +82
Sagittarius.description: Representin' +82 Korean Hip-Hop's sickest rhymes and beats.

Sagittarius.name: Fresh Finds Experimental
Sagittarius.description: The best new experimental music by independent artists and labels.

Capricorn.name: Capricorn
Capricorn.characteristics: Capricorn is the 10th sign of the Zodiac and is associated with hard work and business affairs. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have an ambitious, modest, patient, responsible, stable, trustworthy, powerful, intellectual, perspicacious, and persistent character. They are also prone to coldness, conservatism, rigidity, materialism, and dullness.

Capricorn.name: Feeling Accomplished
Capricorn.description: Celebrate yourself with a fun pop & hip hop mix.

Capricorn.name: Morning Motivation
Capricorn.description: Get your day off to a cracking start!

Aquarius.name: Aquarius
Aquarius.characteristics: Aquarius is the 11th sign of the Zodiac and is associated with future ideas and the unusual. Individuals born under this sign are thought to have a modest, creative, challenging, inquisitive, entertaining, progressive, stimulating, nocturnal, and independent character. They are also prone to rebelliousness, coldness, erraticism, indecisiveness, and impracticality.

Aquarius.name: Fresh Finds Experimental
Aquarius.description: The best new experimental music by independent artists and labels.

Aquarius.name: Energy Booster: K-Pop
Aquarius.description: Need to get your energy level up? This will help!

Aquarius.name: Alternative Hip-Hop
Aquarius.description: New, left-field, and for the real hip-hop stans!

Pisces.name: Pisces
Pisces.characteristics: Pisces is the 12th and last sign of the Zodiac and is associated with human emotions. Individuals born under this sign are thought to be tolerant, modest, dreamy, romantic, humorous, generous, emotional, receptive, and affectionate. They are thought to have an honest character. But they are also prone to exaggeration, fickleness, passiveness, hypersensitivity, and paranoia.

Pisces.name: Piano Ballads
Pisces.description: Vocals and keys, front and center.

Pisces.name: Creativity Boost
Pisces.description: Let these innovative tracks spark your creativity and inspiration.
